content: (kurbaana samayatthu basmalkkoyute shesham manorttho yil ninnu kurishetutthukondu ellaavarum kooti pallikku chuttum aaghoshapoorvvam sleebaayute ekbokalo, kolokalo chollikkondu oru pradakshinam natatthiya shesham madbahaayilo, beemaayilo ninnukondu sleebaa aaghosham natatthunnu.)

than്re vadhatthaal melullavarkku shaanthinalkiya samaadhaanavum than്re bali samarppanatthaal thaazheyulla vare ramyamaakkiya nirappum than്re sleebaayaal vijaathee yare rakshiccha rakshithaavum than്re punaruththaanatthaal bhinni cchirunnavare samyojippiccha snehavum aaya kartthaave! Nin്re svarggaarohana divasatthil bhoothala tthile kalahatthe shamippikkaname. Ellaavidha upadrava ngalilninnum nin്re sleebaayaal njangale kaatthuko llaname. Njangal ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

naathaa! Karunaa-sampannaa!
Ninnute punaruththaanamathum
ninnute svarggaarohanavum
kondaatum perunnaalukalil
ninmaanatthinu yogyamathaam
vachanangale njaan paateetum
ninsleebaayaal rakshitharaam
purajaathikalipperunnaalil
sthuthiyaal keertthikkum ninne
njangalumarththicchothunnu.

njangalute mishihaa thampuraane! Ninte punaruththaanatthil njangal santhoshicchu aahlaadikkukayum ninte svarggaarohanatthil njangal aanandikkukayum cheyyu nnu. Ninte nirappum samaadhaanavum njangalil vaazhumaaraaka name. Ninte snehavum preethiyum njangalil vasippikkaname. Ninte sleebaaye vandikkuvaanum ninte punaruththaanatthe ettuparayuvaanum nin്re svarggaarohanatthil aanandikkuvaanum njangalkku krupa nalkaname. Njangaleyum njangalute maricchupoyavareyum ninte raajya tthil aanandippikkaname. Njangalute kartthaavum nithya dyvavume! Nin്re karthruthvatthe njangal sthuthi kkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname.

uththaanatthin paramaarththam
bodhappettellaavarkkum
enkilumathilaa moodajanam
hantha nishedhamuyartthunnu.
Yoodajanatthaal krooshithano
mahimayotakkabareenneri
athulaaghoshatthotinnaal
svarggaaroham cheyyunnu
praarththanayotadhunaa njangal arththiccheevidhamothunnu.

dyvamaaya kartthaave! Ninte sleebaayute paarshva ngalil maraykkappetuvaanum ninte punaruththaanatthil sadya shyaraayittheeruvaanum ninte uyirppilum svarggaaroha natthilum vishvasikkuvaanum ninte evangeliyo nile kalpanakale aacharikkuvaanum ninte ishtam pravartthikkuvaanum nin്re nyaayapramaanam anushdtikku vaanum ninne snehicchavaraaya neethimaanmaaruteyum punyavaanmaaruteyum praarththanakalil abhayam praapicchu sahaayam labhikkuvaanum njangale yogyaraakkaname. Ava rute apekshakalmoolam njangalkkum njangalute pare tharkkum paapaparihaaram nalkaname. Njangal ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

kartthaave! Nin janathathime
laardratha kaaniccheetaname.
Thaavakamaamavakaashatthil
leshamajaagratha kaattaruthe
nin sleebaayin van kotiyaal
krysthavamakutamuyartthaname.
Prarththanayotadhunaa njangal arththiccheevidhamothunnu.

dyvamaaya kartthaave! Ninte ee svarggaaro hanadivasatthe svarggeeya synyangalotorumicchu pukazhtthuvaan njangale yogyaraakkaname. Aanandapoorvvam ninte perunnaalukal kondaati ninnilninnu nanmakalum anugrahangalum praapikkuvaanum njangale arharaakkaname. Ninte vishuddha sleebaayaalum vishuddhanmaaril vasi cchirikkunna ninte shakthiyaalum kopatthinte vatikalum sakala shikshakalum njangalilninnu neekkikkalayaname. Njangal ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthicchu sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

peedithanum rogaartthannum
saadhuvinum dhanaheenannum
gathiyattonum vidhavaykkum
thunayaayu naathan menmayezhum
thanshaanthiyeyee janathayilum
sabhayithilum nivasippikkaan
praarththanayotadhunaa njangal arththiccheevidhamothunnu.

pattakkaaran:-
doothanmaar se-vippone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Kaabenmaar vaazhtthunnone!
Shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
sraappikal kaadee-shaarppone!
Mruthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
paapikalanuthaapatthotottharththicchothunnu.
Njangalkkaayu svarggaarooddaa! Krupacheyyenam.

theemayar haalal-cholvone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan
aathmeeyar shlaa-ghippone
shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
manmayaraagho-shippone!
Mruthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
vishvaasiniyaam thirusabhathan-suthararththikkunnu.
Njangalkkaayu svarggaarooddaa! Krupacheyyenam.

melullaar maa-nippone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Maddhuyamar keertthikkunnone!
Shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Keezhullor koo-ppunnone!
Mruthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
paapikalanuthaapatthotottharththicchothunnu
njangalkkaayu svarggaarooddaa! Krupacheyyenam.

naathaa! Krupacheytheetenam.
Naathaa! Krupacheyyuka kanivaal
naathaa! Karmmaarththanakale nee kykkondum krupacheytheetenam
deveshaa! The thothram
srashtaave! The sthothram
paapikalaam daasarilaliyum mishihaa raajaave! Sthothram.
